alert.note: Alert for East Central Plains; North Central Mountains; Northeast Highlands; Northeast Plains; Northwest Highlands; Northwest Plateau; Sandia Manzano And Gallinas Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 19 at 3:31PM MDT until May 20 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING THIS AFTERNOON AND EVENING FOR ALL AREAS EXCEPT THE MIDDLE RIO GRANDE VALLEY AND WEST CENTRAL HIGHLANDS DUE TO STRONG WINDS, LOW HUMIDITY, NEAR-RECORD HEAT, AND AN UNSTABLE AIRMASS... ...RED FLAG WARNING FRIDAY FROM LATE MORNING UNTIL MID EVENING FOR ALL AREAS DUE TO STRONG WINDS, LOW HUMIDITY, NEAR-RECORD HEAT, AND AN UNSTABLE AIRMASS... .Strong west to southwest winds with single digit humidity, near record hot temperatures, and an unstable airmass will continue to generate widespread critical fire weather conditions mainly over northern and eastern areas for the remainder of this afternoon and much of this evening. Elevated to locally critical conditions will continue through tonight in a few areas where gusty winds coincide with poor humidity recoveries. Critical to locally extreme fire weather will develop Friday when winds will be the strongest. Winds are expected to taper off slowly after sunset Friday. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 9 PM MDT FRIDAY... * AREA AND TIMING...Northwest Plateau and Highlands, North Central Mountains, Northeast Highlands and Plains, Sandia/Manzano and Gallinas Mountains, and the East Central Plains until 10 PM MDT this evening, and Friday from late morning until mid evening. * 20 FOOT WINDS...West-southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 40 mph today then west-southwest 25 to 35 mph with gusts to 45 mph Friday. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...4 to 8 percent today then 6 to 12 percent Friday. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning.

area.areaDesc: East Central Plains; North Central Mountains; Northeast Highlands; Northeast Plains; Northwest Highlands; Northwest Plateau; Sandia Manzano And Gallinas Mountains
